mapper.insert:
insert into plan_and_inspect () VALUES
(#{item.batchNum},#{item.planNum},#{item.inspectCreateTime}, #{item.ts},#{item.plateTypeDetermination},#{item.mechanicalPropertiesDetermination}, #{item.dimensionalDeviationDetermination},#{item.surfaceQualityDetermination},#{item.appearanceQualityDetermination}, #{item.allDetermination},#{item.remark}, #{item.createTime},#{item.updateTime})
on duplicate key update plan_num=values(plan_num), inspect_create_time=values(inspect_create_time), ts=values(ts), plate_type_determination=values(plate_type_determination), mechanical_properties_determination=values(mechanical_properties_determination), dimensional_deviation_determination=values(dimensional_deviation_determination), surface_quality_determination=values(surface_quality_determination), appearance_quality_determination=values(appearance_quality_determination), all_determination=values(all_determination), remark=values(remark), create_time=values(create_time), update_time=values(update_time)
mapper.select: select ts from plan_and_inspect order by ts desc limit 1
